favourite.article: This song is just so beautiful, I will share this with our Sunday school kids. Thanks.
The Lord has been good to all of us!!! So we can rejoice all together that He made us; so wonderfuly MADE ALL OF US!!!!!!!!!!!!
Hallelujah! I am fearfully, wonderfully, specially and carefully made by my CREATOR. Isn't that wonderful and amazing?
I totally agree with Michelle! Our Lord God Almighty is the only and the only Creator!
GEN 1:1 IN THE BEGINNING GOD CREATED... THIS RULES OUT EVOLUTION AND THE BIG BANG THEORY. HE IS THE CREATOR !
